text: William Martin "Clu" Gulager (November 16, 1928 - August 5, 2022) was an American actor and director. He was born in Holdenville, Oklahoma. He was known for his co-starring role as William H. Bonney (Billy the Kid) in the 1960–1962 NBC television series The Tall Man and for his role as Emmett Ryker in another NBC western series, The Virginian. He also played Burt Wilson in The Return of the Living Dead and Ken Walsh in A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Revenge. He also played a book store owner in Quentin Tarantino's 2019 movie Once Upon a Time in Hollywood. Gulager died on August 5, 2022 at his son's home in Los Angeles, California at the age of 93.Clu Gulager, Actor in ‘The Virginian,’ ‘The Last Picture Show’ and ‘Return of the Living Dead,’ Dies at 93 ==References== ==Other websites== *Clu Gulager fan website * *Interview from psychotronicvideo.com *Mystery Science Theater 3000, episode #908 (The Touch of Satan) * Encyclopedia of Oklahoma History and Culture – Gulager, Clu Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Actors from Oklahoma Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:American stage actors Category:American movie directors
